creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
<?xml version="1.0" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.0//EN"
"http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-SVG-20010904/DTD/svg10.dtd">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" 
    width="450" height="500" viewBox="0 0 450 500" onmouseover="alert('Hello')">

    <rect x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%" fill="crimson" />
    <circle cx="50%" cy="50%" r="150" fill="gold" />
   
	<script type="text/ecmascript">

	function showDialog(msg) {
		alert(msg);
	}

	</script> 
</svg>

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
Seems to work for me.  Reopen the bug with more information if you think
there is still a problem.
